titles: The Passion sermon preached at Paules Crosse, on Good-Friday. Apr. 14. 1609. By I.H.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publisher: Printed by W. S[tansby] for Samuell Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the Signe of the Bull-head,
notes: A variant of the edition with E. Edgar's name in the imprint (STC 12694).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
